Parameters:

agnet handle
Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.process.exception.IndexOutOfBoundException - can't locate the agent id in the agent list of the given algorithm

getAgentList

java.util.List<Agent> getAgentList()
                                   throws au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException
Get the list of all agents of the current algorithm of the algorithm manager. Agents are proxies of ports and processors. User can use them to check status of ports and processors. Not all the ports and processors have agents. The agents are specified in the algorithm recipe xml files. Agents are observable but not controllable.

Returns:
list of agents
Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException - no current algorithm found

getAgentList

java.util.List<Agent> getAgentList(Algorithm algorithm)
Get the agent list of a loaded algorithm.

Parameters:
algorithm - algorithm handle
See Also:
getAgentList()

isDisposed

boolean isDisposed()
Get isDispose status of the algorithm. If an algorithm loses reference, it is subjected to garbage collection by java VM and is set to be disposed.
